Description:
As a Data Scientist, you will analyze large amounts of raw data to find patterns that will help improve our company, solve challenges and communicate actionable insights for our clients. We rely on you to build data products to extract valuable business insights. In this role, you are highly analytical with a knack for analysis, math and statistics. Critical thinking and problem-solving skills are essential for interpreting data. We also want to see a passion for machine-learning and research. Your goal is to help our company and our clients analyze trends to enable better decision making. This is a hybrid position open for all nationalities. Our Headquarter location is in Muscat, Oman.

Responsibilities
• Work with internal and external stakeholders to assist with data-related technical issues and identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions.
• Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer... acquisition, operational efficiency, and other key business performance metrics.
• Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of data sources and data gathering techniques.
• Mine and analyze data using state-of-the-art algorithms on large datasets to extract trends and discovering patterns.
• Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data.
• Design and develop predictive models using machine learning algorithms to increase and optimize customer experiences and other business outcomes.
• Analyze the problem-solving capabilities and use-cases of machine learning algorithms and rank them by their success probability.
• Explore and visualize data for better understanding and identify differences in data distribution that could impact model performance when deploying it in real-world scenarios.
• Perform statistical analysis and fine-tune models using test results.

Skills
• Knowledge of algorithms and data structures.
• Advanced math and statistics skills (linear algebra, calculus, Bayesian statistics, mean, median, variance, etc.)
• Programming experience in Python, R, Java, C++, etc.
• Demonstrated experience working with large, complex datasets using scalable tools related to machine learning and big data.
• Strong ability to write complex, efficient, and eloquent SQL queries to extract data.
• Experience in working with database systems like SQL and NoSQL.
• Robust data modeling and data architecture skills.
• Experience in working with various machine learning libraries and packages like scikit-learn, Theano, TensorFlow,Keras, Matplotlib, Caffe, etc.
• Develop tooling and infrastructure that supports data scientists with model development.
• Problem-solving aptitude.
• Excellent communication and presentation skills.
• BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field; graduate degree in Data Science or other quantitative field is preferred.

Benefits
• On top of a highly competitive salary, you can expect:
• Exposure to high-impact, interesting projects
• An honest, entrepreneurial, collaborative, high-performance culture
• Infinite opportunities to learn, both on the job and through our rigorous professional development program
• A fun and dynamic work environment (we're based in the premier co-working space in the city, Al Rudha

Esbaar is seeking an Artificial Intelligence Engineer to join our team in developing computer vision and machine learning solutions for clients across a variety of industries.

At Esbaar, we pride ourselves not only in building the right solutions for our clients through research and development, but in implementing and scaling up those solutions through strong engineering. This role is an opportunity to apply your cross-functional skillsets, creativity and experience in computer vision and machine learning in order to solve exciting product development challenges.

Responsibilities

Develop novel state-of-the-art vision algorithms and corresponding systems, leveraging deep learning techniques.

Research, develop and prototype advanced computer vision technologies and integration with hardware edge processors.

Develop high-quality computer vision algorithms for localization, object detection, classification, and video analysis.

Translate algorithms into production-level... code.

Contribute to a large code base in Python for deploying these models in production environments.

Develop GUIs or integrate software with dashboards.

Preparing image datasets, sorting, filtering and labeling within a team environment.

Interface with the product manager to develop R&D plans, proposals, intellectual property filings, commercialization strategies and other material that facilitate the innovation process.

Prepare reports, proposals, plans and presentations for internal and external audiences.

Requirements

Experience developing machine learning models and neural network-based computer vision models.

Experience deploying vision systems on the edge for real-time applications.

Python expertise.

Good software engineering skills.

Strong ability to present work and communicate ideas to technical and non-technical coworkers.

Experience with machine learning libraries such as Tensorflow, Keras, Sklearn and others.

Experience with GUI tools (Tkinter, Qt).

Experience using OpenCV.

Experience with git and other such versioning tools.

Experience with DevOps cloud tools (AWS, Google Cloud etc.).

Experience with programming in a Linux environment.

Experience with MLOps tools such as Kubeflow will be a plus.

Experience with dashboards (Grafana) will be a plus.

Experience handling a large code base in python will be a plus.

Experience developing computer vision algorithms for anomaly detection will be a plus.

Fluency in English

The Proficient AI Architect should have a deep knowledge on all matters related Artificial Intelligence systems architecture, Impact Analysis, solution designing, and planning for all service requests received from Systems Release & Delivery Management team and ensuring the designs are scaled appropriately, cost-effective and meet requirements, standards and quality thresholds. The Proficient AI Architect provides mentoring and advices to the solution design team members. Provide support in knowledge creation as well as development and execution of medium and long term planning for BI systems platforms, services and products in line with company strategic requirements.
• Leads all aspects of the delivery of Artificial Intelligence solution & related components, interfaces, conversions, HW/ SW oversight that driver better understanding of business performance, improvement areas and support strategic.
• Develop scalable and maintainable AI applications to meet business objectives.
•... Collaborate with AI Administrators, Developers and Analysts for successful development of AI solutions.
• Analyze and do impact assessment for all Service Requests received from Release & Delivery Management team.
• Develop high level architecture design with impact analysis of the change in the eco-systems and how to fulfill the SR end-to-end.
• Produce high level architecture design document so development & implementation team can start the low level and details design accordingly.
• Maintain deep understanding on enterprise architecture directions as well as status of enabling layer systems so that all development is coherent.
• Drive SOA-transformation and ensure development of reusable IT components.
Skills
• Deep knowledge of systems platforms, services & products.
• Deep knowledge of Artificial Intelligence systems design and implementation.
• Deep knowledge in implementing Machine Learning and other AI tools.
• Strong knowledge on international telecom industry standards such as NGOSS, eTOM.
• Strong knowledge of Enterprise Architecture planning and design.
• Strong knowledge of MS Office, especially Excel.
• Strong knowledge of Software Development Lifecycle Management (SDLC).
• Strong knowledge of Infrastructure planning and design.
• Strong presentation skills, Inter-Personal Communication skills
• Good knowledge in software licences management.
• Strong knowledge of Integration Capabilities.
• Strong knowledge in systems requirements analysis.
• Good knowledge in ICT solutions, initiatives and projects.
• Good knowledge in project management
